   20: %% Originally based on Per Gustafsson's test suite.
   21: %%
   22: 
   23: -module(mc_no_module_opt_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -export([all/0,suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   26: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   27:          basic/1,duplicate_keys/1,mixed/1,
   28:          shadow/1,bad_generators/1]).
   29: 
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: 
   32: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [{group,p}].
   36: 
   37: groups() ->
   38:     [{p,test_lib:parallel(),
   39:       [basic,
   40:        duplicate_keys,
   41:        mixed,
   42:        shadow,
   43:        bad_generators]}].
   44: 
   45: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     test_lib:recompile(?MODULE),
   47:     Config.
   48: 
   49: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   53:     Config.
   54: 
   55: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   56:     Config.
   57: 
   58: basic(_Config) ->
   59:     mc_double(0),
   60:     mc_double(1),
   61:     mc_double(2),
   62:     mc_double(3),
   63:     mc_double(4),
   64:     mc_double(5),
   65: 
   66:     mc_double(17),
   67:     mc_double(18),
   68:     mc_double(19),
   69: 
   70:     mc_double(30),
   71:     mc_double(31),
   72:     mc_double(32),
   73:     mc_double(33),
   74:     mc_double(34),
   75: 
   76:     mc_double(63),
   77:     mc_double(64),
   78:     mc_double(65),
   79: 
   80:     mc_double(77),
   81:     mc_double(127),
   82:     mc_double(128),
   83:     mc_double(255),
   84:     mc_double(333),
   85:     mc_double(444),
   86:     mc_double(7777),
   87:     mc_double(8765),
   88: 
   89:     %% Patterns that cannot possibly match.
   90:     #{} = #{K => V || K := [V]={V} <- id(#{a => [b]})},
   91:     #{} = #{K => V || [K] = 42 := V <- id(#{42 => whatever})},
   92: 
   93:     %% Filtering.
   94:     Map = #{{a,1} => {a,b,c}, {b,42} => [1,2,3], c => [4,5,6], d => {x,y}},
   95:     [c, d] = lists:sort([K || K := _ <- Map, is_atom(K)]),
   96:     [{a,b,c}, [1,2,3]] = lists:sort([V || {_,_} := V <- Map]),
   97:     [1] = [H || {_,_} := [H|_] <- Map],
   98:     [c, {b,42}] = lists:sort([K || K := [_|_] <- Map]),
   99: 
  100:     %% Filtering using literal patterns.
  101:     [] = [0 || a := b <- #{}],
  102:     [] = [0 || a := b <- #{x => y}],
  103:     [0] = [0 || a := b <- #{a => b}],
  104: 
  105:     <<>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{} >>,
  106:     <<>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{x => y} >>,
  107:     <<0>> = << <<0>> || a := b <- #{a => b} >>,
  108: 
  109:     ok.
  110: 
  111: mc_double(Size) ->
  112:     Seq = lists:seq(1, Size),
  113:     Map = #{{key,I} => I || I <- Seq},
  114: 
  115:     MapDouble = #{K => 2 * V || K := V <- id(Map)},
  116:     MapDouble = maps:from_list([{{key,I}, 2 * I} || I <- Seq]),
  117: 
  118:     OddKeys = lists:seq(1, Size, 2),
  119:     OddKeys = lists:sort([I || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  120:                                I rem 2 =/= 0]),
  121: 
  122:     OddMap = #{I => [] || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  123:                           I rem 2 =/= 0},
  124:     OddMap = #{I => [] || {key,I} := I <- Map,
  125:                           id(I) rem 2 =/= 0},
  126:     OddKeys = lists:sort(maps:keys(OddMap)),
  127: 
  128:     %% Test that map comprehensions works on iterators.
  129:     test_iterator(Map, 0),
  130:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map) div 3),
  131:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map) div 2),
  132:     test_iterator(Map, map_size(Map)),
  133: 
  134:     ok.
  135: 
  136: test_iterator(Map, N) ->
  137:     Iter0 = maps:iterator(Map),
  138:     {First,Iter} = grab(N, Iter0, []),
  139:     All = [{K,V} || K := V <- Iter] ++ First,
  140:     Map = maps:from_list(All),
  141:     ok.
  142: 
  143: grab(0, Iter, Acc) ->
  144:     {Acc,Iter};
  145: grab(N, Iter0, Acc) ->
  146:     case maps:next(Iter0) of
  147:         none ->
  148:             {Acc,Iter0};
  149:         {K,V,Iter} ->
  150:             grab(N - 1, Iter, [{K,V}|Acc])
  151:     end.
  152: 
  153: duplicate_keys(_Config) ->
  154:     #{x := b} = #{V => K || {K,V} <- [{a, x}, {b, x}]},
  155: 
  156:     #{a := 4, b := 4} =
  157:         #{K => V || K <- [a,b],
  158:                     <<V>> <= <<1,2,3,4>>},
  159:     ok.
  160: 
  161: mixed(_Config) ->
  162:     Map = id(#{1 => 10, 2 => 5, 3 => 88, 4 => 99, 5 => 36}),
  163:     Bin = << <<K:8,V:24>> || K := V <- Map >>,
  164:     Map = maps:from_list([{K,V} || <<K:8,V:24>> <= Bin]),
  165: 
  166:     Atoms = [list_to_atom([C]) || C <- lists:seq($a, $z)],
  167:     Integers = lists:seq(1, 64),
  168: 
  169:     mixed_1(Atoms, Integers),
  170:     mixed_2(Atoms, Integers),
  171:     mixed_3(Atoms, Integers),
  172: 
  173:     sum_of_triangular_numbers(7),
  174:     sum_of_triangular_numbers(10),
  175: 
  176:     ok.
  177: 
  178: mixed_1(Atoms, Integers) ->
  179:     IntegerMap = #{N => [] || N <- Integers},
  180:     IntegerKeys = [N || N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  181:     Integers = lists:sort(IntegerKeys),
  182:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  183:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N := [] <- maps:iterator(IntegerMap)],
  184:     Combined = [{C,N} || C <- Atoms, N <- IntegerKeys],
  185: 
  186:     ok.
  187: 
  188: mixed_2(Atoms, Integers) ->
  189:     IntegerMap = #{N => [] || N <- Integers},
  190:     IntegerKeys = [N || N := [] <- IntegerMap],
  191:     Bin = << <<N:16>> || N := [] <- IntegerMap >>,
  192:     Integers = lists:sort(IntegerKeys),
  193: 
  194:     Combined = [{C,N} || N := [] <- IntegerMap, C <- Atoms],
  195:     Combined = [{C,N} || N := [] <- maps:iterator(IntegerMap), C <- Atoms],
  196:     Combined = [{C,N} || <<N:16>> <= Bin, C <- Atoms],
  197:     Combined = [{C,N} || N <- IntegerKeys, C <- Atoms],
  198: 
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: mixed_3(Atoms, Integers) ->
  202:     Map = #{K => V || {K,V} <- lists:zip(Atoms, Integers, trim)},
  203:     Bin = << <<N:16>> || _ := N <- Map >>,
  204:     {TrimmedAtoms,TrimmedIntegers} = lists:unzip([{K,V} || K := V <- Map]),
  205: 
  206:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K := _ <- Map, _ := V <- Map]),
  207:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K <- TrimmedAtoms, <<V:16>> <= Bin]),
  208:     Combined = lists:sort([{K,V} || K <- TrimmedAtoms, V <- TrimmedIntegers]),
  209: 
  210:     ok.
  211: 
  212: sum_of_triangular_numbers(N) ->
  213:     Sum = N * (N + 1) * (N + 2) div 6,
  214:     Maps = [#{I => I || I <- lists:seq(0, I)} || I <- lists:seq(0, N)],
  215:     Numbers = [I || M <- Maps, I := I <- M],
  216:     Numbers = lists:flatten([[I || I := I <- M] || M <- Maps]),
  217:     Sum = lists:sum([lists:sum([I || I := I <- M]) || M <- Maps]),
  218:     Sum = lists:sum(Numbers),
  219:     ok.
  220: 
  221: shadow(_Config)->
  222:     Shadowed = nomatch,
  223:     _ = id(Shadowed),				%Eliminate warning.
  224:     Map = #{Shadowed => Shadowed+1 || Shadowed <- lists:seq(7, 9)},
  225:     #{7 := 8, 8 := 9, 9 := 10} = id(Map),
  226:     [8,9] = lists:sort([Shadowed || _ := Shadowed <- id(Map),
  227:                                     Shadowed < 10]),
  228:     ok.
  229: 
  230: bad_generators(_Config) ->
  231:     %% Make sure that line numbers point out the generator.
  232:     case ?MODULE of
  233:         mc_inline_SUITE ->
  234:             ok;
  235:         _ ->
  236:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  237:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  238:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,4}]}|_]}} =
  239:                 catch id(bad_generator(a)),
  240: 
  241:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  242:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  243:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,7}]}|_]}} =
  244:                 catch id(bad_generator_bc(a)),
  245: 
  246:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},
  247:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  248:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,10}]}|_]}} =
  249:                 catch id(bad_generator_mc(a)),
  250: 
  251:             BadIterator = [16#ffff|#{}],
  252: 
  253:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  254:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  255:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,4}]}|_]}} =
  256:                 catch id(bad_generator(BadIterator)),
  257: 
  258:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  259:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  260:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,7}]}|_]}} =
  261:                 catch id(bad_generator_bc(BadIterator)),
  262: 
  263:             {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,BadIterator},
  264:                      [{?MODULE,_,_,
  265:                        [{file,"bad_mc.erl"},{line,10}]}|_]}} =
  266:                 catch id(bad_generator_mc(BadIterator))
  267:     end,
  268:     ok.
  269: 
  270: id(I) -> I.
  271: 
  272: -file("bad_mc.erl", 1).
  273: bad_generator(Map) ->                           %Line 2
  274:     [{K,V} ||                                   %Line 3
  275:         K := V <- Map].                         %Line 4
  276: bad_generator_bc(Map) ->                        %Line 5
  277:     << <<K:8,V:24>> ||                          %Line 6
  278:         K := V <- Map>>.                        %Line 7
  279: bad_generator_mc(Map) ->                        %Line 8
  280:     #{V => K ||                                 %Line 9
  281:         K := V <- Map}.                         %Line 10
